text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo Are you joking? Have you learned nothing Donnie? Your voice will not distract from your failures in response of Covid-19  and your blatant attack on peaceful protestors Following Mr. Floyd's murder. PROTESTORS WILL OUTNUMBER YOUR WORDS OF HATE!
